channel.title: flutter on 为吾优
channel.description: Recent content in flutter on 为吾优

item.title: Flutter 总结
item.description: flutter 使用总结 安装 测试安装环境 flutter doctor 创建项目 flutter create name 使用注意 热更新 原理是在本地搞了一个服务器，localhost所以真机测试是不行的。只能使用模拟器

item.title: flutter安装
item.description: flutter安装 git 下载 flutter：git clone -b stable https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git 配置.zshrc export PATH=/Users/fanjinlong/dev/flutter/flutter/bin:$PATH export ANDROID_HOME=/Users/fanjinlong/Library/Android/sdk export PATH=${PATH}:${ANDROID_HOME}/tools export PATH=${PATH}:${ANDROID_HOME}/platform-tools export PUB_HOSTED_URL=https://pub.flutter-io.cn export FLUTTER_STORAGE_BASE_URL=https://storage.flutter-io.cn # 记得配置完了，执行下 source ~/.zshrc 更新环境变量 命令行执
